snippet: Fake accounts and fraudulent “likes” are an especially acute problem for Facebook as it has sought to distinguish itself as a place for real identity on the Web.
abstract: Fake accounts and fraudulent 'likes' are especially acute problem for Facebook as it has sought to distinguish itself as a place for real identity on the Web; fakery damages trust of advertisers and ruins credibility of search results; Facebook is stepping up efforts to cull fakes from site.
lead_paragraph: Fake accounts and fraudulent “likes” are an especially acute problem for Facebook as it has sought to distinguish itself as a place for real identity on the Web.

headline.seo: False Posts on Facebook Undermine Its Credibility
headline.main: Facebook’s False Faces Undermine Its Credibility
